title: Portfolio website
description: I built this website to showcase my work and to learn more about Gatsby, CI/CD and have more experience with React.
imageAlt: Code editor showcasing the development of the portfolio website

title: Cicerone Indoor navigator
description: Designed an indoor navigator UX and UI, as well as a small scale feasibility study, focusing on social inclusion and equal access to space

title: Oven consumption calculator
description: Developed the consumption model and webapp for a parametric consumption calculator of ovens, with downloadable PDF report.

title: AI Meal planning research
description: Qualitative methods research investigating the need and perception of an AI assistant to meal planning. Collaborated with a group to code the data and analyze it.

title: Trust in Chatgpt vs Google
description: Comparative study to analyze self-perceived trust in regular search engines and large language models

title: Non-addictive instagram redesign
description: Redesign of Instagram to make it less addicting and more ethical
